task_description: You should identify the number of the item in the bag.

image_introduction.introduction: This is a screenshot of a single grid in the bag, the bottom right corner represents the number of the item in the bag.

few_shots.introduction: This is an example: The number is clearly at the bottom right corner of the image, which is 27.
This is an example: The number is clearly at the bottom right corner of the image, which is 37.
This is an example: There is no number presented at the bottom right corner of the image, so the number should be 1.
